title: The Return of Nino
description:
Nino Cutraro is a former editor for /DRIVE (online and television), is now a lead editor for Mark Walberg's production company, Unrealistic Ideas. He is also a budding music producer. He's collaborated with a number of up-and-coming artists and his new album, "No Time", is up on Soundcloud. 

Check out Nino's album on soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/oninjones

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/fkgwUd_tekQ


Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @xpacnino

Check out our merch!
https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
